gaia::ui::IGalleryOnItemClickListener Class Reference

Detailed Description

Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item in this provider has been clicked.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void gaia::ui::IGalleryOnItemClickListener::onItemClick ( gaia::ui::AbsListWidget *  pParent,
gaia::core::Widget *  pWidget,
int32_t  position,
int64_t  id 
) [pure virtual]

Callback method to be invoked when an item in this provider has been clicked.

Parameters:
pParentThe provider widget where the click happened.
pWidgetThe widget within the provider that was clicked (this will be a widget provided by the provider)
positionThe position of the widget in the provider.
idThe row id of the item that was clicked.
